conbody.p: DITA Open Toolkit empowers organizations to customize their PDF documentation. You can customize the following document elements:
The scope of customization is robust. You specify custom XSLT for your PDF and custom CSS for your XHTML-based documents. can be scripted at the level of CSS class attributes.
See About CSS Customization for a description of the CSS style elements you can customize.
conbody.note: Elements of a document refer to parts of your documents rather than a Document Ojbect Model, or DOM, such as the JavaScript and HTML DOMs.
Customization of font color in PDF documents is not supported in version 1.5.3 of the toolkit.
